member.name: M:GraphLib.Edge.Rotate
member.summary: Rotates the edge. Swaps StartVertex and EndVertex

member.name: P:GraphLib.Graph.IsConnectedGraph
member.summary: If this graph is not oriented, it returns a value that indicates whether it is connected

member.name: P:GraphLib.Graph.IsStrongConectedGraph
member.summary: If this graph is oriented, it returns a value that indicates whether it is connected. An oriented graph is said to be strongly connected if it has a (oriented) path from any vertex to any other

member.name: P:GraphLib.Graph.IsUnilaterallyConnectedGraph
member.summary: If this graph is oriented, it returns a value that indicates whether it is unilaterally connected. An oriented graph is called unilaterally connected if for any two of its vertices u and v there is at least one of the routes from v to u or from u to v.

member.name: P:GraphLib.Graph.IsWeaklyConnectedGraph
member.summary: An oriented graph is called weakly connected if there is a connected unoriented graph obtained from it by replacing the oriented edges with non-oriented ones.

member.name: M:GraphLib.Graph.PathExist(GraphLib.Vertex,GraphLib.Vertex)
member.returns: Return boolean value which show that exist route between startVertex and goalVertex

member.name: M:GraphLib.Graph.IncidentalEdges(GraphLib.Vertex,GraphLib.Vertex)
member.summary: Iincidental edges for vertex1 and vertex2
member.returns: Returns list of incidental edges for vertex1 and vertex2

member.summary: Checks whether the input matrix is symmetrical

member.summary: Checks whether the input matrix is adjacency

member.name: M:GraphLib.Graph.IsIncidenceMatrix(System.Int32[][],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks whether the input matrix is incidence

member.summary: Convert adjacency matrix to incidence matrix

member.summary: Convert adjacency matrix to vertices list

member.summary: Convert vertices list to adjacency matrix
